metadata.title: CVE-2015-5309 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the terminal emulator in PuTTY before 0.66 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) orpossibly execute arbitrary code via an ECH (erase characters) escapesequence with a large parameter value, which triggers a buffer underflow.

criterions.comment: putty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
